attributes.action: HARD ON CRIME, serious and petty, make prisons harder and criminals to serve their FULL sentence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Be hard on crime, scrap the rights of criminals, support for victim, NOT the criminal. Review and change the human rights bill. 
Start with the benefits system, the rest will follow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
